utils.utils module

src.utils.utils.save_dataframe_to_csv(df: DataFrame, file_path: str, **kwargs: Any) → None[source]

Save a Pandas DataFrame to a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – The DataFrame to be saved.

  • file_path (str) – The file path where the DataFrame will be saved.

  • **kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to be passed to to_csv function.

Returns:

None

src.utils.utils.save_model(model: Any, filename: str) → None[source]

Save a machine learning model to a file using pickle.

Parameters:

  • model (Any) – The machine learning model to be saved.

  • filename (str) – The path or filename where the model should be saved.

Returns:

This function doesn’t return anything. It saves the model to the specified file.

Return type:

None

  • file_path (str) – The file path where the DataFrame will be saved.

  • **kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to be passed to to_csv function.

None

src.utils.utils.update_config_file(file_path: str, new_data: Dict[str, Any]) → None[source]

Update an existing YAML configuration file with new data.
